author: wddgit
body:
This only affects the stall grapher script and output.
Fix some bugs that had insignificant effects on the
pdf output file, but made the code harder to read and
understand (and were adding incorrect lines to the ascii
output). Add and fix some code comments. Update the command
line help message. Small improvements to simplify the code
itself. Small improvements to the ascii output.
title: Cleanup in edmStreamStallGrapher
